Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2008 11:02AM hvnlyangel wrote: HI Amber, I am not a nurse or health care professional. But you are human too and depending on what kind of nurse you are, yes you need information too. I am now 7 days out from surgery.  I am one that doesnt like to be pampered but have to learn to let it happen.  I do want to say that nurses are wonderful people they take better care of you then doctors.
Posts.Title: Nurses with Breast Cancer Jo_Ann_K PatRN10
